pages.text: The $(item)Iron Blade Head$() may be attached to an $(l:engineering/automaton)Automaton$(). When the $(item)Automaton$() rotates, it'll deal damage to any living being in the rotation arc.$(br2)Furthermore, it'll also do so as a lunge of sorts when the $(item)Automaton$() goes from the down state to up.
It may not be particularly useful for you to swing around, but sure enough an $(item)Automaton$() can swing it properly.
